replies.body: I'm still honestly shocked he even has a following. After seeing him on League of Children, I figured he was a small time ragey streamer that gets a small amount of views from people wondering what nonsense he'll do next. Didn't think people actually defended him.

Well, I think there is a group of people who object to permabans on principle regardless of what a player does.  In other words, it doesn't matter how toxic Tyler1 was, they don't think he should be permabanned for it.

Thing is he wasnt permaed he was player banned, I have never seen anyone else in my life seen player banned from league I think there are plenty of other streamers that need the same treatment *cough* nicktron kaceytron *cough* meteos
i mean, why call it league of children when you can call it league of losers. lol is the only game where even when you win you lose.
He got popular after that video. Sort of put him on the map.

Because some people think of his toxicity funny. That's why they go watch. Like each channel on twitch has something that attracts viewers. Most of it for the gameplay itself. Some is for the boobs and fan service (kaceytron, etc.). And then there's Tyler1
This. It was funny to watch tyler1. It's like watching a train wreck.
Someone needs to create "a man does not simply ban Tyler 1" meme
"...more than 20 times"

I wouldn't call myself a fanboy but I just enjoyed his streams because they were actually fun to watch, even if he is toxic. I don't like watching some nerd Meteos playing the game like he was deaf and not interacting with viewers and being toxic, it's just not for me. Well, now that he and gross gore are gone... bye twitch.
and do you think it was fun for the 9 other players that had to be in game wen he fed raged ect

not all of his matches are feeding. he may rage almost every game but he carries too.
Like someone else said, if you shit on the side walk 1/7 days a weak, you're still shitting ont the side-walk.
Definitely heard that one before... definitely.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
but he dose feed and rage stop trying to defend him makes you worse then him
It must've been fun considering 90% of games he played there were trolls on his and enemy team, there were feeders on his team and campers on the enemy team so yeah I actually bet they had fun

I don't like watching some nerd Meteos playing the game like he was deaf and not interacting with viewers and being toxic, it's just not for me. Well, now that he and gross gore are gone... bye twitch.

Seems like you're the kinda guy who would defend Gross Gore even though he admitted he lied and called himself a retard.
Seems like you're the kind of guy who follows every crowd\meta.

Gross gore made a mistake only reason he was permad was because it was his 3rd strike but if you look at the first 2 strikes they were pretty much bs reasons to be striked for no he did deserve the ban but perma really? if anything around 3 weeks to 3 months would be fine

> [{quoted}](name=IShootTheyDance,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JwlYYQ8a,comment-id=000200020001,timestamp=2016-05-01T22:46:42.396+0000)
>
> Gross gore made a mistake only reason he was permad was because it was his 3rd strike but if you look at the first 2 strikes they were pretty much bs reasons to be striked for no he did deserve the ban but perma really? if anything around 3 weeks to 3 months would be fine

If you're talking about gross gore he got a fuckin perma ban because he falsely accused Krepo for raping a 15 year girl, he did it publicly because he was mad for some reason, he said why in his last video.
People make mistakes they shouldnt have to pay with the rest of their life for it.

> [{quoted}](name=IShootTheyDance,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JwlYYQ8a,comment-id=00020002000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-02T02:03:12.163+0000)
>
> People make mistakes they shouldnt have to pay with the rest of their life for it.

You do realize accusing someone of rape is an extremely serious accusation. People get branded for the rest of their lives for that. Krepo almost lost his job and his future because this guy started lying about him, I think a perma ban is appropriate, even Gross Gore said that it's deserved and that he fucked up so at least this guy regrets it, but nonetheless he deserved a severe punishment, also you should consider that Krepo is employed by Riot as a caster and analyst so they have to look out for their own.

he just passed information he already heard, he wasn't the one accusing him, besides he probably wouldn't mention it ever again even if not warned, yes he did fuck up and it was a big mistake but I still doubt he deserves perma ban which basically ruins his career.

> I don't like watching some nerd Meteos playing the game like he was deaf and not interacting with viewers and being toxic

Meteos interacts a fair amount with the chat/donations lol. Please, do tell me how he was playing like he was deaf, I'm waiting. This'll be fun, give me  all the times that Meteos has been toxic, now, give me all times Tyler1 has been toxic.
http://www.stratuga.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/imaqtpie.png

wheres laughing fish when you need him. Tired of all this tyler bs

Felt I wasted my time. I need to post a meme or something to wash away the salt I picked up.
Let's just forget about him already
Agreed.
This picture implies we're done for...
I think alot of people are shocked that he has a perma ban and other streamers or just players in general that do the same thing are not pretty sure they just wanted to make an example of someone

2 wrongs don't make it right buddy
